name: Techno Blast
description: You fire a powerful beam of pure light. The line is 80 feet long and 5 feet wide, and all creatues caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 3d10 + MOVE damage on a failure, or half as much on a success. The damage type is dependant on the Drive the user holds. (Burn Drive - Fire, Chill Drive - Ice, Douse Drive - Water, Shock Drive - Electric)
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 7d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Works well if the user is pumped up.
